alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 3:24PM CDT until June 12 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Vernon Parish in west central Louisiana... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 323 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles north of Toledo Bend Dam to near Hutton, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Leesville, Rosepine, Anacoco, Fort Polk, Pitkin, Slagle, New Llano, Hornbeck, Lacamp, Fullerton, Hutton, Burr Ferry, Kurthwood, Leander, Cravens, Simpson, Evans and Pickering. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
